ChoiceEvent

enspire.interactivity.events.IInteractivityClipEvent
enspire.interactivity.events.ChoiceEvent

Event that is dispatched from any Movie Clip that inherits from Choice when the standard mouse actions are performed on the clip.

Summary
ChoiceEventEvent that is dispatched from any Movie Clip that inherits from Choice when the standard mouse actions are performed on the clip.
Variables
CHOICE_PRESSStatic enumeration returned by getType if this event was created by a mouse press.
CHOICE_RELEASEStatic enumeration returned by getType if this event was created by a mouse release.
CHOICE_OVERStatic enumeration returned by getType if this event was created by mousing over the Choice.
CHOICE_OUTStatic enumeration returned by getType if this event was created by mousing out of the Choice.
CHOICE_MOVEStatic enumeration returned by getType if this event was created by the mouse moving while over the Choice.
CHOICE_FEEDBACK_CLICKStatic enumeration returned by getType if this event was created by the mouse moving while over the Choice.
type
obj
Functions
ChoiceEventCreates a new ChoiceEvent with the given type, and a reference to the Choice instance that is linked to this event.
getTypeReturns the type of this event, which will be one of the various enumerations like CHOICE_RELEASE.
getObjReturns the Choice object that is associated with this event.
traceMe

Variables

CHOICE_PRESS

public static var CHOICE_PRESS

Static enumeration returned by getType if this event was created by a mouse press.

public static var CHOICE_RELEASE

Static enumeration returned by getType if this event was created by a mouse release.

public static var CHOICE_OVER

Static enumeration returned by getType if this event was created by mousing over the Choice.

CHOICE_OUT

public static var CHOICE_OUT

Static enumeration returned by getType if this event was created by mousing out of the Choice.

CHOICE_MOVE

public static var CHOICE_MOVE

Static enumeration returned by getType if this event was created by the mouse moving while over the Choice.

CHOICE_FEEDBACK_CLICK

public static var CHOICE_FEEDBACK_CLICK

Static enumeration returned by getType if this event was created by the mouse moving while over the Choice.

type

private var type: Number

obj

private var obj: InteractivityClip

Functions

ChoiceEvent

public function ChoiceEvent(type: Number,
obj: InteractivityClip)

Creates a new ChoiceEvent with the given type, and a reference to the Choice instance that is linked to this event.

Example

var ce = new ChoiceEvent(ChoiceEvent.CHOICE_PRESS,mcChoice);

getType

public function getType():Number

Returns the type of this event, which will be one of the various enumerations like CHOICE_RELEASE.

Example

var type = ce.getType();

getObj

public function getObj():InteractivityClip

Returns the Choice object that is associated with this event.

Example

var choice = ce.getObj();
choice.gotoAndStop("over");

traceMe

public function traceMe()
Base class implementing the functionality needed for a basic Choice.
